data.name: HAMMER WORLD: DIMENSION TRAVELER
data.detailed_description:
WHAT IS HAMMER WORLD?


"HAMMER WORLD: DIMENSION TRAVELER" is a first-person metroidvania with physics-based combat built in Unreal Engine 4. Explore mysterious dimensions, unlock new abilities, and fight back against evil with your hammer friend!

GAME SYSTEM


This game features non-linear exploration through a variety of interconnected worlds.

Venture forth and:
  • Upgrade your hammer and unlock new combat and traversal abilities!
  • Master the physics-based melee combat system!
  • Fight a variety of strange enemies and test your mettle against fearsome bosses!
  • Uncover secret areas and hidden challenges!

MORE INFO SOON!


HAMMER WORLD is currently in active development. More updates coming soon!

data.short_description: "HAMMER WORLD: DIMENSION TRAVELER" is a first-person metroidvania with physics-based combat built in Unreal Engine 4. Explore mysterious dimensions, unlock new abilities, and fight back against evil with your hammer friend!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
